timeline.message:
Merge pull request #463 from eclipse/master

Master
chore: Change current project version

fix: Fix syntax analysis termination with unexpected copy statements GH-464
Pass copy enter and exit tags to a special channel to skip them on parsing

perf: Remove unnecessary token operations on replacing
Simplify replacing logic by reusing text collector in the grammar listener.

Merge pull request #471 from eclipse/skip-cpy-tags

Fix syntax analysis termination with unexpected copy statements #464

refactor: Unify modules into one project (#473)

Signed-off-by: Azat Satklichov <azat.satklichov@broadcom.com>
Merge branch 'development' into in-place-token-utils

Merge pull request #465 from eclipse/in-place-token-utils

Remove unnecessary token operations on replacing
docs: Show quality gate in readme

Merge pull request #475 from eclipse/quality-gate-button

docs: Show quality gate in readme

test: remove duplicated junit5 version

Signed-off-by: Azat Satklichov <azat.satklichov@broadcom.com>

Merge pull request #476 from asatklichov/cleanup-junit5-version

remove duplicated junit5 version
test: Change test preprocessor to accept dots in multi-token clauses

feat: Outline view support #481

Signed-off-by: Anton Grigorev <anton.grigorev@broadcom.com>

Merge pull request #439 from grianbrcom/outlineView

feat: Outline view support

docs: Adjust the error message for 80 chars limit

Signed-off-by: Anton Grigorev <anton.grigorev@broadcom.com>
Merge branch 'development' into underline_copy_stmt

Merge pull request #483 from grianbrcom/longLineErrorMsg

docs: Adjust the error message for 80 chars limit
feat: Underscore the copy statement if it contains a syntax error #450

feat: Provide default COBOL code snippets #484

Signed-off-by: Azat Satklichov <azat.satklichov@broadcom.com>

Merge pull request #485 from eclipse/underline_copy_stmt

Underscore the Copy Statement if the Copybook Contains a Syntax Error

fix: Allow multi-line errors underscoring GH-486
Rename Position into Locality and change its structure to allow using LSP4J positions directly in the language engine.

Merge pull request #493 from eclipse/multi-line-positions

Allow Multi-line Errors Underscoring
fix: Fix a typo in DIVIDE-REMAINDER code snippets

Merge pull request #495 from eclipse/fix_remainder_snippet

Fix a typo in DIVIDE-REMAINDER code snippets

ci: Change versioning pipeline

GH action for changelog draft generation was added.
GH action for
releasing was added.
Jenkinsfile changed to use branch and build number
in package version.

Signed-off-by: Anton Grigorev <anton.grigorev@broadcom.com>

refactor: adjust code snippets into ibm-specific snippets

Signed-off-by: Azat Satklichov <azat.satklichov@broadcom.com>

Merge pull request #500 from grianbrcom/versioningUpdate

ci: Change versioning pipeline
Merge branch 'development' into provide-cobol-code-snippets

build: Remove +NEXT from hardcoded version

On CI/CD the build number is added after version and result (like
0.13.0+NEXT+PR-492.6) is not valid.

Signed-off-by: Anton Grigorev <anton.grigorev@broadcom.com>

Merge pull request #501 from grianbrcom/fixVersion

Remove +NEXT from hardcoded version
Merge branch 'development' into provide-cobol-code-snippets

refactor: rename code-snippet prefix to shell

Signed-off-by: Azat Satklichov <azat.satklichov@broadcom.com>

[doc] Copybooks section improvements (#499)

Signed-off-by: Zeibura Kathau <zeibura.kathau@broadcom.com>

refactor: insert more new code snippets

Signed-off-by: Azat Satklichov <azat.satklichov@broadcom.com>

ci: explicitly specify release-it version

Signed-off-by: Anton Grigorev <anton.grigorev@broadcom.com>

Merge pull request #503 from grianbrcom/releaseItVersion

ci: explicitly specify release-it version

Merge pull request #492 from asatklichov/provide-cobol-code-snippets

Provide default COBOL code snippets #484
fix: Fix checking program ID with quotes #477

Merge pull request #505 from eclipse/fix-quoted-program-id

Fix checking program ID with quotes #477
fix: Fix incorrect indicator area error message #494

ci: Remove semantic release tool

Signed-off-by: Anton Grigorev <anton.grigorev@broadcom.com>

Merge pull request #510 from grianbrcom/delSemanticRelease

Remove semantic release tool

Merge pull request #508 from eclipse/fix-indicator-area-message

Fix incorrect indicator area error message #494
doc: Fix long line error message

Merge pull request #511 from eclipse/fix-long-line-msg

Fix Too Long Line Error Message
Update CHANGELOG.md
Update CHANGELOG.md

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to mention the performance improvements in the changelog? It seems to be technical details
timeline.author: temanbrcom
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,23 @@
 # Changelog
 All notable changes to the COBOL Language Support extension are documented in this file.
 
+## [0.14.0](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/compare/0.13.0...0.14.0) (2020-09-10)
+
+### Bug Fixes
+* Allow multi-line errors underscoring GH-486 ([b79bd82](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/b79bd82a1446e22316d3b4aec03e1cd9b1159a88)), closes [#486](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/486)
+* Fix a typo in DIVIDE-REMAINDER code snippets ([00cd27d](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/00cd27d1e63369d6695be05654bad7fdca4aa7a7))
+* Fix checking program ID with quotes [#477](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/477) ([2c247ff](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/2c247fff1766262a3651a8fa9a4e587b54af3921))
+* Fix incorrect indicator area error message [#494](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/494) ([5a6501e](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/5a6501ead0feffb4038ce67424b04d2e28b82c21))
+* Fix syntax analysis termination with unexpected copy statements GH-464 ([6b0ad8e](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/6b0ad8e5eabbd4f97edaa625184358255ae3e1f6)), closes [#464](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/464)
+
+### Features
+* Outline view support [#481](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/481) ([16ba495](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/16ba495c5226575a2d530a3c1bc9a9dec156d2d5))
+* Provide default COBOL code snippets [#484](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/484) ([c98df71](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/c98df710f945cc25e849563e2f89a864db8d06c7))
+* Underscore the copy statement if it contains a syntax error [#450](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/450) ([082bbf7](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/082bbf7765158ea4bc54ac31b41972c0938dbcc4))
+
+### Performance Improvements
+* Remove unnecessary token operations on replacing ([0a59352](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/0a593526182e9259dbb30e6a329363fe9686e8e0))
+

timeline.bodyText: Previously we didn't add the links, should we do it now?
timeline.author: temanbrcom
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,23 @@
 # Changelog
 All notable changes to the COBOL Language Support extension are documented in this file.
 
+## [0.14.0](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/compare/0.13.0...0.14.0) (2020-09-10)
+
+### Bug Fixes
+* Allow multi-line errors underscoring GH-486 ([b79bd82](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/b79bd82a1446e22316d3b4aec03e1cd9b1159a88)), closes [#486](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/486)
+* Fix a typo in DIVIDE-REMAINDER code snippets ([00cd27d](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/00cd27d1e63369d6695be05654bad7fdca4aa7a7))
+* Fix checking program ID with quotes [#477](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/477) ([2c247ff](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/2c247fff1766262a3651a8fa9a4e587b54af3921))
+* Fix incorrect indicator area error message [#494](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/494) ([5a6501e](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/5a6501ead0feffb4038ce67424b04d2e28b82c21))
+* Fix syntax analysis termination with unexpected copy statements GH-464 ([6b0ad8e](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/6b0ad8e5eabbd4f97edaa625184358255ae3e1f6)), closes [#464](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/464)

replies.bodyText: It's up to you, it is just a question of the changelog consistency
replies.author: temanbrcom

timeline.bodyText: I think here we should only extract the changes that are significant for the user
timeline.author: temanbrcom
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,23 @@
 # Changelog
 All notable changes to the COBOL Language Support extension are documented in this file.
 
+## [0.14.0](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/compare/0.13.0...0.14.0) (2020-09-10)
+
+### Bug Fixes
+* Allow multi-line errors underscoring GH-486 ([b79bd82](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/b79bd82a1446e22316d3b4aec03e1cd9b1159a88)), closes [#486](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/486)
+* Fix a typo in DIVIDE-REMAINDER code snippets ([00cd27d](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/00cd27d1e63369d6695be05654bad7fdca4aa7a7))
+* Fix checking program ID with quotes [#477](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/477) ([2c247ff](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/2c247fff1766262a3651a8fa9a4e587b54af3921))
+* Fix incorrect indicator area error message [#494](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/494) ([5a6501e](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/5a6501ead0feffb4038ce67424b04d2e28b82c21))
+* Fix syntax analysis termination with unexpected copy statements GH-464 ([6b0ad8e](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/6b0ad8e5eabbd4f97edaa625184358255ae3e1f6)), closes [#464](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/464)
+
+### Features
+* Outline view support [#481](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/481) ([16ba495](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/16ba495c5226575a2d530a3c1bc9a9dec156d2d5))
+* Provide default COBOL code snippets [#484](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/484) ([c98df71](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/c98df710f945cc25e849563e2f89a864db8d06c7))
+* Underscore the copy statement if it contains a syntax error [#450](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/issues/450) ([082bbf7](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/082bbf7765158ea4bc54ac31b41972c0938dbcc4))
+
+### Performance Improvements
+* Remove unnecessary token operations on replacing ([0a59352](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/commit/0a593526182e9259dbb30e6a329363fe9686e8e0))
+

replies.bodyText: like having full list of changes available for the contributors and a short one for the users?
replies.author: zimlu02

replies.bodyText: Yes, we had a discussion about this some time ago. Just have a look at the previous release - we have the changelog with the pattern Added/Changed/Fixed without any technical details
replies.author: temanbrcom

timeline.message: Update CHANGELOG.md
Update CHANGELOG.md
Update CHANGELOG.md
Update CHANGELOG.md

timeline.bodyText: In this context, the list elements should begin with a noun
timeline.author: temanbrcom
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,22 @@
 # Changelog
 All notable changes to the COBOL Language Support extension are documented in this file.
 
+## [0.14.0](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/compare/0.13.0...0.14.0) (2020-09-10)
+
+#### Added
+
+- Outline view support
+- Breadcrumb support
+- Provide default COBOL code snippets
+- Underscore the copy statement if it contains a syntax error
+
+#### Fixed
+- Allow multi-line errors underscoring GH-486
+- Fix a typo in DIVIDE-REMAINDER code snippets
+- Fix checking program ID with quotes
+- Fix incorrect indicator area error message
+- Fix syntax analysis termination with unexpected copy statements GH-464

replies.bodyText:
Outline view support
Breadcrumb support
Default COBOL code snippets
Underscoring the copy statement if it contains a syntax error

Fixed

Multi-line errors underscoring GH-486
A typo in DIVIDE-REMAINDER code snippets
Program ID check with quotes
Incorrect indicator area error message
Syntax analysis termination with unexpected copy statements GH-464
replies.author: temanbrcom

timeline.message: Update CHANGELOG.md
